sentences.en: A cardinal perched momently on the dogwood branch.
sentences.cn: 一只北美红雀在山茱萸上停留了片刻.

sentences.en: Deciduous tree style such as maple, oak, elm, dogwood, apple, etc.
sentences.cn: 落叶类树包括枫 、 橡木 、 榆树 、 茱萸 、 苹果树等等.

sentences.en: Deciduous tree style such as maple, oak, elm, dogwood, redbud, etc.
sentences.cn: 落叶类树包括枫 、 橡木 、 榆树 、 茱萸 、 紫荆等等.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore the effect of Dogwood fruits on tonifying kidney yang.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨山茱萸补肾阳作用.

sentences.en: Spring had come early that year, with warm quick rains and sudden frothing of pink peach blossoms and dogwood dappling with white stars the dark river swamp and far-off hills.
sentences.cn: 春天来得很早，伴随来的是几场温暖的春雨，这时粉红的桃花突然纷纷绽放，山茱萸雪白也似的繁花将河边湿地和山冈装点起来。

sentences.en: The car climbed a twisting stretch of road through solid dogwood.
sentences.cn: 汽车穿过密密匝匝的山茱萸,顺着一条蜿蜒的道路盘旋而上.

sentences.en: The dogwood bud, pale green is inlaid with russet markings.
sentences.cn: 山茱萸的蓓蕾, 淡绿清雅,点缀着褐色斑痕.

sentences.en: Tilly sat in Colleen’s mother’s lap, still eating cake, and Karen ran around the dogwood, chased by one of her cousins.
sentences.cn: 蒂莉坐在科琳妈妈的怀里，还在吃蛋糕，卡伦被一个表妹追得绕着山茱萸跑。

sentences.en: Yangchengshan yu specialty also known as dogwood, common name red milk.
sentences.cn: 阳城特产山萸亦称山茱萸, 俗名红奶.

words.tran_cn: 山茱萸科植物的；淡黄褐色的
